group_1.narration: We finally thought we reined Mitama in.@But then she served her party soup!
We had to eat it if we wanted the meal@to end on a good note.
And so we resigned ourselves to our fates...

group_1.textRight: Okay, then. Here...goes.

group_1.textLeft: First, the broth...

group_1.textRight: [chara:100153:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!
It tastes...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300801:lipSynch_0][chara:300801:motion_100][chara:300801:lipSynch_1]Amazing!

group_1.textRight: It's really good!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, this rocks. It tastes REAL good!

group_1.textCenter: Hee hee. I'm glad everyone found it to their@liking♪

group_1.textLeft: How is this possible?!
This soup tastes incredible!

group_1.textRight: It tastes like...actual food!
Did you make this by yourself?!

group_1.textLeft: No, no, Iroha and Yachiyo gave me lots of@help.
I just seasoned it a little. With a special,@secret ingredient...

group_1.textRight: Don't tell me ya put some weird drug in@the broth?!
Maybe we're only hallucinating that it@tastes good.
Hey! Cut it out, you two!

group_1.textLeft: I came across some very tasty soup earlier.
I wanted everyone to try it!
So I asked for the recipe and made it here.

group_1.textRight: Mitama!
That's so thoughtful, thank you.

group_1.textLeft: I really wanted to have that soup again,@you see.
So I wasn't being totally selfless.

group_1.textRight: Of course.
Still, it's really great! I'm super@impressed!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:111700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Aww! I'm very touched to hear that♪
Well then! Now we can make it even yummier.
Next time I make this soup, I think I'll@try customizing it.

group_1.textRight: If YOU customize it, you'll just ruin it.
It tastes awesome just like it is.

group_1.textLeft: Don't get too full of yourself!
No matter the meal, it can always be@improved with a little bit of thought.

group_1.textRight: A little bit of thought, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Yes! Here, I'll prove it.
I have a bad feeling about this.

group_1.textRight: *Gulp*

group_1.textLeft: Okay! Sorry to keep you!
I'll make the leftover soup extra tasty...
...by adding a little bit of this, and some of@this♪

group_1.textRight: [chara:300801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Is that fried chicken?! Why do you have@that?!
Uh...I think I recognize that drink, too.

group_1.textLeft: These are very precious ingredients!
A bento shop's prized fried chicken@and the Feral Sauce Himika gave me♪
When you take one great ingredient and@add it to another...
[chara:111700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It equals deliciousness!

group_1.textRight: Huh?!
She dropped the fried chicken and Feral@Sauce into the soup!
What are you doing, Mitama?!

group_1.textLeft: This will make it tastier. AND more@nutritious!
Okay, everybody! Come get your second@helping of soup!

group_1.textRight: I wish I passed out back when Momoko did.

group_1.textLeft: Ugh... We were so close.

group_1.textRight: Er... Ah ha ha...

group_1.narration: And in the end the extraordinary soup was@complete, our eyes paid the price for its@spiciness, and we began the year with suffering.
But we rested and regained some strength.@And we got to eat other tasty food, so...@All in all, we had a great time together.

group_1.textCenter: That's the last of the food. It's about time@to wrap things up!
Once more, thank you all for coming to see@me at the start of the year.
Your Coordinator hopes to see you again@very soon!
We'll be looking forward to it!
Let's have another great year together,@Mitama!
